title: Flight 93 National Memorial: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Fees There is no entrance fee for Flight 93 National Memorial.  America the Beautiful Passes - Since there is no entrance fee, the memorial does not carry the America the Beautiful Passes - Annual Pass, Senior Pass, and Access Pass. You may acquire or purchase any of these passes at any National Park Service site that charges a fee.  More information on the pass program or to purchase online NPS sites in western Pennsylvania with a fee
